name: Monkey King Taichi
description:
Monkey King TaiChi /猴极

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Alchemy furnace，this is an plight ,also is a new beginning and a new ritual of sublimation to the Monkey King .

2016,the Year of Monkey in China.

We hope this game bring you good luck.

Best Wishes!

------------------

[Instructions]:

[Direction keys] to control MonkeyKing and his Doppelganger at the same time.

("P"-Key to Restart)

Synchronous and Reverse-Action Avoid these red-charm and bounce the Gold-Elixir to destory the Eight-Diagram'Tactics

One should not run after two horses at the same time?

Find the Key About Balance.

Hope you have fun!
